lookAt

public void lookAt(double[] orientation,
                   double[] position,
                   double[] up,
                   float fogStart,
                   float fogEnd)
This is the default implementation - invoke the glViewer version of 'lookAt'. Note that Ligand Explorer overrides this and uses the LXSceneNode 'lookAt'

Note: Fog not implemented, yet.

Parameters:
orientation -
position -
up -
